Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:呼

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+547C

Main pronunciation 主要发音: hū

Other pronunciations 其它发音: hū,xiāo,xū,hè,xià

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to breath.

English senses 英语理解: breathe sigh, exhale; call, shout

Usage example 用法举例: 呼喚 hū huàn (call)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 847

Shuowen 说文解字: 𧦝謼也從言虖聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 謼 from mouth-speak 訁 yán and phonetic shout 虖 hū C225 呼<虖嘑謼> simp 呼.

謼字的基本解释

謼
hū
古同“呼”，大声叫号：“一夫大謼，天下响应者，陈胜是也。”
古同“諕”，惊吓。
姓。

謼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hū］
［《廣韻》荒烏切，平模，曉。］
［《廣韻》荒故切，去暮，曉。］
(1)同“呼”。号叫，大声喊叫。
(2)惊吓。
(3)姓。汉有謼毒尼。见《汉书·景武昭宣元成功臣表》。

謼字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　謼； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1179第02
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?荒故切，呼去聲。【說文】?，謼也。【廣韻】號謼也。【前漢·息夫躬傳】仰天大謼。【集韻】或作嘑。　又姓。【前漢·功臣表】下摩侯謼毒尼。【霍去病傳】作呼毒尼。　又【前漢·天文志】鬼哭若謼。【評林字例】謼，古呼字。【韻會小補】漢書內，呼字皆去聲。　又【玉篇】【廣韻】荒烏切【集韻】【正韻】荒胡切，?音呼。與虖同。大叫也。【爾雅·釋言】號謼也。【註】今江東皆言謼。【疏】謂叫謼也。【前漢·王莽傳】欲謼邑與計較。　又【集韻】虛交切，孝平聲。與詨同。【前漢·灌夫傳】謼服謝罪。【師古註】謼，古呼字。若謂啼爲謼服，則謼音火交反，服音平卓反。○按《正字通》作平聲轉去聲，入暮韻。《說文》止有荒故切。諸韻書去聲內有謼字，與呼同。平聲內虖字或作謼，自應以去聲爲正。又【前漢·天文志】作去聲讀，《灌夫傳》又作平聲讀，?古呼字。兩字疑古皆通。

謼字的起名意思

暂无。

謼
Basic explanation of words
謼
hū
Gu Tong "screamed" and called out loudly: "A man is a great man, the world responder, Chen Sheng is the same."
Gu Tong "coiled" and frightened.
name.
謼
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hū］
["Guangyun" Wild Wu cut, flat model, Xiao. ]
["Guangyun" cuts off the absurdity, goes to dusk, dawn. ]
(1) Same as "call". Shouting, shouting loudly.
(2) Fright.
(3) Last name. There are poisonous drugs in the Han Dynasty. See "Book of Han·Jing Wuzhao Xuan Yuan Success Minister Table".
謼
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　謼; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 1179 02
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Cut the absurdity, scream. [Said Wen]?, Jian Ye. 【Guangyun】Hao Jian also. 【Previous Han·Shifu Biography】Looking up to the sky. [Ji Yun] Or make a sigh.　Another last name. [Former Han · Hero Form] Xia Mohou Jian Du Ni. [Huo Qubing Chuan] As Hudu Ni.　[Previous Han·Astronomy] The ghost cries as if it is a ghost. [Comment on Lin's Words] 謼, the ancient call word. 【Yunhui Xiaobu】In the Chinese book, all the words are called out.　[Yu Pian] [Guang Yun] Huang Wu cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Huang Hu cut,? Sound call. Same as 虖. Yelling too. 【Erya·Interpretation】Hao Jian also. [Note] Today Jiangdong is full of words. 【Sparse】It is called Chi also. [Previous Han·Wang Mang Biography] Desire and care.　[Jiyun] Virtual intersecting, filial piety. Same as 詨. [Previous Han · Guan Fu Biography] Plead guilty. 【Shigu Note】謼, the ancient call word. If it is said that sing is sing, then the sound of sing is crossed, and the sound of sing is flat. ○According to "Zhengzitong", make a flat voice, turn to a voice, and enter Mu Yun. "Shuowen" only has absurdities. There are 謼 characters in the tones of Zhu Yunshu, which is the same as the call. If the inner sound of the flat sound or the word is used, the sound should be taken as the positive. Also [Pre-Han · Astronomical History] was used for audio reading, and "Guanfu Biography" was also used for flat sound reading, "Ancient Hu". The two words are both suspicious and ancient.
謼
